name: My First Monster Hunt
description:
A choose-your-own-adventure about a young huntress who is coming of age and must therefore complete a test before she is recognized as a true huntress by her village. Lots of decisions to make!

Made in the course of an online class. You can't use the numbers on the numblock unfortunately, also q to quit doesn't work (yet). I also haven't finished the text yet, so lots of unfinished story arcs where you just die :D Will hopefully update soon!
